root.name: Beast Wars: Transformers
root.description: OverviewBeast Wars: Transformers is a third person shooter for the original Playstation based on the series of the same name. Players choose to either play on the Maximal or Predacon factions. StoryDescendants to the original Autobots and Decepticons, the Maximals and Predacons crash land on a strange planet. Soon they find themselves stranded and unable to survive in their robot forms due to the high levels of Energon on the surface of the planet, taking on beast forms to protect themselves. However, the Predacons realize the potential of the planet's Energon and attempt to harvest the Energon in an effort to repair their crashed ship and conquer the galaxy using the its power. Now it is up to the Maximals to stop the Predacons by any means possible.Playable CharactersMaximals Optimus Prime Cheetor Rattrap Rhinox Airazor Dinobot Predacons Megatron Scorponok Tarantulas Blackarachnia Inferno Terrorsaur
